All About Cats

Quick facts, popular breeds, and caring tips — responsive and ready for any device.

What is a Cat?

Domestic cats (Felis catus) are small carnivorous mammals kept as pets for companionship and pest control. They are known for independence, agility, and varied vocalizations like purring and meowing.

Key traits: retractable claws, night vision, excellent hearing, playful behavior.

Popular Breeds

Care Tips

  • Feed a high-protein diet made for cats.
  • Keep water fresh and available at all times.
  • Regular vaccinations and vet check-ups.
  • Provide scratching posts and safe toys.
Quick Grooming

Short-haired cats need weekly brushing; long-haired cats need daily grooming to prevent mats. Check ears and trim claws safely.

Cat Quotes

"Time spent with cats is never wasted."

"Cats choose us; we don't own them."
